name: Global Research Conference on Toxicology and Applied Pharmacology
content: We are happy to announce that December 12–14, 2024, in Rome, Italy, will be the dates of the Global Research Conference on Toxicology and Applied Pharmacology. Leading experts in the domains of applied pharmacology and toxicology will come together for this three-day conference to share their most recent discoveries, network, and establish collaborative relationships. The conference's primary objective is to present the latest developments and difficulties in the fields of applied pharmacology and toxicology, including genotoxicity, clinical pharmacology, forensic toxicology, analytic toxicology, drug toxicity, drug delivery systems, and more. There will be seminars, exhibits by sponsors and exhibitors, oral and poster presentations by participants, and keynote and plenary talks by distinguished professionals during the conference. We kindly invite you to attend GRCTAP2024 with us and take in Rome's grandeur and culture—one of the world's most popular travel destinations. You'll get the chance to network with colleagues, pick the brains of subject matter experts, and explore fresh perspectives in applied pharmacology and toxicology. We can't wait to see you in Rome in 2024 for this thrilling and motivational event!
